title: Drawing, "Design for a Cup", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: "COUPE;" at lower right: "J.P./36/(square root sign) 2."
dimensions: 33.6 X 22.7 cm (13 1/4 X 8 15/16 in.), irregular sheet
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Flaring bowl drawn in plan and elevation raised on a cylindrical foot, the bottom two thirds with applied lobed decoration. Underdrawing in graphite of cup in golden section.
Puiforcat collection contains archival photograph of cup sitting on a square wooden base, Box 7, Folder 19, "Cups, 9000 series" # 9129.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 9129, Coupe sur cylindrique gadrons ciselee sur socle palissandre.
